thread.title: Bluedrop Announces Results of Annual and General Meeting

author: cnbc.com
title: Bluedrop Announces Results of Annual and General Meeting
text:
ST. JOHN’S, Newfoundland and Labrador--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bluedrop Performance Learning (“ Bluedrop ”) (TSX-V: BPLI) is pleased to announce that the shareholders approved all of the proposals put forward by the Board of Directors at the annual general meeting of shareholders held on March 8, 2018 (the “ Meeting ”). At the Meeting, the shareholders re-elected Emad Rizkalla, Derrick Rowe, Andrew Youngman, Paul Sparkes and Tom Astle as directors of Bluedrop to hold office until their successors are duly elected or appointed.
In addition, at the Meeting, KPMG were appointed as auditors of Bluedrop until the next annual meeting of shareholders or until a successor is appointed, and the shareholders authorized the directors of Bluedrop to fix the auditors’ remuneration.
The Board of Directors re-appointed Mr. Derrick Rowe as Executive Chairman of the Board and confirmed the continuation of Mr. Emad Rizkalla as President and Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Bernie Beckett as Chief Financial Officer and Mr. John Moores as Chief Operating Officer.
The Board of Directors would like to thank the shareholders for their ongoing support.
About Bluedrop
Bluedrop Performance Learning Inc. (TSX-V: BPLI) is an innovator in workplace training for individuals, corporations, military personnel and the public sector. Bluedrop is transforming the workplace globally by designing, developing and delivering practical, actionable and affordable training content that improves individual and overall performance of organizations. For more information, visit www.bluedrop.com .
